FeedbackPage.Title: Feedback
FeedbackPage.Description: Help us improve Bondery by sharing your thoughts
FeedbackPage.NpsLabel: From 0 to 10, how likely are you to recommend Bondery to a friend or colleague?
FeedbackPage.NpsReasonLabel: Why did you pick the score of {score}?
FeedbackPage.NpsReasonPlaceholder: Because I found this feature useful/buggy/missing...
FeedbackPage.GeneralFeedbackLabel: Any feedback, tips, or bugs you would like to share?
FeedbackPage.GeneralFeedbackPlaceholder: I love/hate this part of the app.. I would like to see this added.. I have struggled with..
FeedbackPage.SubmittingMessage: Please wait while we send your feedback
FeedbackPage.ErrorMessage: Failed to submit feedback. Please try again.

LoginPage.TermsAgreement: By continuing, you agree to our

Profile.Title: Profile
Profile.UnlinkAccountMessage: Are you sure you want to unlink your {provider} account? You can always link it again later.

Profile.DragImageHere: Drop image or click to select

Preferences.Title: Preferences
Preferences.TimezoneDescription: Used to show local times and schedule reminders correctly
Preferences.ReminderTimeDescription: Choose should we send an email about your reminders
Preferences.InvalidReminderTime: Reminder time must be between 00:00 and 23:59

DataManagement.Title: Data management
DataManagement.SignOutDescription: Sign out of your account on this device
DataManagement.DeleteAccountDescription: Permanently delete your account and all associated data
DataManagement.DeleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone and all your data will be permanently deleted.
DataManagement.DeleteConfirmButton: Yes, I want to delete my account
DataManagement.SignOutWait: Please wait while we sign you out

LinkedInImport.CardDescription: Import contacts from your LinkedIn data export
LinkedInImport.InstructionStep1LinkLabel: Download my data in LinkedIn settings
LinkedInImport.InstructionStep2: Wait for the email that your data is ready
LinkedInImport.DropzoneDescription: We will locate Connections.csv, validate the format, and prepare contacts for import.
LinkedInImport.InvalidRowsHint: Some rows are invalid and can be deselected before import.
LinkedInImport.ExistingHandleTooltip: Person with same handle already exists
LinkedInImport.NoContactsSelected: Select at least one contact to import.
LinkedInImport.InvalidFile: Invalid file. Upload a LinkedIn ZIP export or folder containing Connections.csv.

InstagramImport.CardDescription: Import contacts from your Instagram data export
InstagramImport.InstructionStep11: You will receive your information copy in your email when it is ready
InstagramImport.DropzoneDescription: We will validate the data, and prepare contacts for import.
InstagramImport.InvalidRowsHint: Some rows are invalid and can be deselected before import.
InstagramImport.ExistingHandleTooltip: Person with same handle already exists
InstagramImport.NoContactsSelected: Select at least one contact to import.
InstagramImport.InvalidFile: Invalid file. Upload exactly one Instagram ZIP export file.

GroupsPage.Empty: No groups yet. Create one to start organizing your contacts.

GroupDetailPage.Empty: No contacts are linked to this group yet.
